abstract: At the midpoint of the price range, Yelp would be valued at about $778 million, a relatively lower valuation by some accounts, but one that could reflect the company’s warnings of slowing growth.
snippet: At the midpoint of the price range, Yelp would be valued at about $778 million, a relatively lower valuation by some accounts, but one that could reflect the company’s warnings of slowing growth.

headline.main: Yelp Expects Its I.P.O. to Price at $12 to $14 a Share

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
